snippet.title: GC Paper Mario: The Thousand Year Door - Intro
snippet.description: I loved this one. I was even a bit surprised by how griped to the screen I was, only leaving it upon completing it. It looks like 'Paper Mario' but the GameCube extra power shows off in many areas of the game. Also an excellent soundtrack and the usual intelligent humor of the series made this a winner. I loved the 'Glitz Pit'!
